Visit Channel

About the Channel

Chris Baitson is a landscape photographer and YouTuber from Hull, UK, who has become known for his practical, no-nonsense approach to photography education. An OM System shooter, Chris challenges the gear-obsessed culture of photography by demonstrating that stunning images come from skill, creativity, and dedication rather than expensive equipment. His content focuses on accessible landscape photography with an emphasis on technique over technology.

Content Style

  • Skill-over-gear philosophy - proving budget equipment can produce stunning results
  • Landscape photography featuring UK locations, especially Scotland
  • Educational tutorials on composition, lighting, and technique
  • Depth of field expertise explaining M43‚Äôs unique advantages
  • Real-world demonstrations showing the complete photography process
  • Budget-friendly approach making photography accessible to everyone

Why We Recommend This Channel

Chris represents a refreshing voice in photography education. In an industry often obsessed with the latest and most expensive gear, he demonstrates that the camera is just a tool - it‚Äôs the photographer‚Äôs vision, understanding of composition, and ability to manipulate light that truly matter. His videos have been featured on photography education sites like Fstoppers, recognizing his valuable perspective on what really creates great photographs.

Best For

  • Photographers on a budget wanting to improve their skills
  • Learning the advantages of M43 for landscape work
  • Understanding depth of field and its creative applications
  • OM System/Olympus users
  • Those tired of gear-focused content
  • Landscape photographers at all skill levels

Photography Philosophy

Skill Over Gear: Chris emphasizes that the quality of your photos depends more on your skill and creativity than on your equipment. The camera doesn‚Äôt think, plan, or care about the shot - it simply follows the photographer‚Äôs instructions.

The Right Time Matters Most: Being out at sunrise with any camera will yield better results than expensive gear used at the wrong time of day.

Persistence Pays Off: Returning to the same location multiple times offers new opportunities to capture different lighting, weather conditions, and compositions.

Invest in Yourself: Rather than obsessing over the latest gear, photographers should focus on developing their skills, learning fundamentals, practicing regularly, and developing their unique style.

M43 Advocacy

Chris is particularly known for his videos explaining the practical advantages of Micro Four Thirds, especially regarding depth of field control in landscape photography. He challenges the full-frame superiority narrative by showing what M43 does differently (and often better) for specific applications.
